title: Projects
text:
Here is a selection of my Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) and data apps.






Sales Dashboard


Retail Sales Dashboard
A predictive analytics dashboard built with Streamlit and Prophet to forecast Q4 inventory needs.





NLP Analyzer


Customer Sentiment Analyzer
An NLP tool that scrapes Twitter data and performs sentiment analysis using Hugging Face transformers.







Image Classifier


Plant Disease Detector
Computer vision model deployed on Streamlit Cloud to identify plant pathologies from user uploads.
